text: Eugene Semyon Vindman (born Yevgeny Semyonovich Vindman; June 6, 1975) is an American politician, attorney, and retired U.S. Army officer. He is the member of the U.S. House of Representatives for Virginia's 7th congressional district since 2025. He was a deputy legal advisor for the United States National Security Council (NSC) until he was reassigned on February 7, 2020. Vindman became well known in October 2019 when his twin brother, Lieutenant Colonel Alexander Vindman, testified before the United States Congress about the Trumpâ€“Ukraine scandal. In 2024, Vindman won the Democratic Party nomination for in the U.S. House of Representatives, Vindman won election to Congress in the general election for that office. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Kyiv Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Military people from Virginia Category:Ukrainian military people
title: Eugene Vindman
